@lindsburge I have no problem with some government money or policy, but I haven't seen any innovation. Gov't can't be only answer.
This will take innovation, changes to current structures and rethinking the role of a "newspaper" & "media". Something status quo won't do.
Or better yet, all media form alliance against Facebook to not share content unless they get better cut of ads.
Why do I have digital spends that are almost 100% Facebook? Because its efficient, its cheap and its targeting is second to none.
Canadian media needs to find a way to take back ad dollars from Facebook and Google. How? Make it easy to target and buy ads.
No. It doesn't. It needs innovation. How about you put someone in charge of PostMedia that isn't a status quo, overâ€¦ https://t.co/EHU9cAcFaw
My favourite example: Most of us get same (or more) for massages under insurance as we do therapy. #BellLetsTalk
(4/4) So keep talking, but but the words into action. #BellLetsTalk
(3/4) Need government, employers, insurance providers and health industry to work together. #BellLetsTalk
(2/4) Stigma is first battle, but also need affordable access to mental health services. Still out of reach for most. #BellLetsTalk
(1/4) Important to not only talk about mental health, but to work towards practical solutions #BellLetsTalk
